page.title: 02HOMELIFE GOLDSBOROUGH AREA
page.content: Lots of people in Goldsborough have{ {cats and dogs}for{pets.Gardening, {knitting and sewing}are the most popular hobbies that people do at home. At the weekend some people have{egg {and bacon}for breakfast.On a Sunday lunchtime{Yorkshire pudding}is still a very popular dish. One of our favourite meals is{fish {and chips}but{beef-burgers}are also popular.For sweet we like{Arctic Roll, {ice-cream}and{jelly.}For snacks we like{crisps,apples}or{biscuits. If people have babies they often put guards over the fire and at the bottom of the stairs. The most popular sports are{swimming {golf and cricket}and people enjoy{ {music (singing and dancing) }and going to the{theatre.}
